Function DB-SET-DEADLOCK-DETECTION

Syntax:

db-set-deadlock-detection atype &key environment => t

Arguments and Values:

atype---one of :default, :expire, :maxlocks, :minlocks, :minwrite, :oldest, :random or :youngest

environment---an environment

Description:

Enable deadlock detection whenever a lock conflict occurs, and specify how conflicts are to be resolved.

See Also:

WITH-ENVIRONMENT.
